title: Hour 2 - Rob Manfred and Chris Mannix (07-01-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Rob Manfred and Chris Mannix (07-01-20)
description:
Commissioner of major league baseball Rob Manfred tells Dan that if he could have changed 1 thing and get a do over it would be the language around playing in empty stadiums with no fans. He says that no fans in the stand should have warranted a new negotiation. Chris Mannix tells Dan that he is fairly positive that the NBA will crown a champion this season. Chris says he will stop calling Orlando a bubble because it is not with all the Disney employees in and out of the facility.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
